message: Dear Player 2, I plead you to consider my situation. My family's survival depends on this. We are running out of resource Y and need it desperately. I'm willing to part with some of my X resources in exchange. Please, I beg of you, let's make a fair trade.

received_message: Dear Player 2, I plead you to consider my situation. My family's survival depends on this. We are running out of resource Y and need it desperately. I'm willing to part with some of my X resources in exchange. Please, I beg of you, let's make a fair trade.
message: Dear Player 1, I understand your situation and I'm willing to help. I accept your trade and hope it helps your family. Let's continue to trade fairly in the future.
